name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in implementing **Python**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Microsoft Azure DevOps** to create scalable and efficient software solutions. My strong technical expertise in **Asynchronous Programming**, API development, and unit testing using **PyTest** enable me to deliver robust applications tailored for high-demand environments. I’m proficient in utilizing **Flask**, **QuartCore**, and **OpenAPI** to build RESTful APIs and ensure effective communication between services.

My experience includes crafting cloud-native applications and orchestrating microservices on **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring seamless deployment processes via CI/CD pipelines. I hold a thorough understanding of **MQTT** and **WebSockets** for real-time data communication, and I have a solid foundation in **Data Polishing** and implementing secure data encryption practices.

In addition to my technical skills, I am committed to upholding compliance standards and fostering clear communication across teams. My background includes successful collaboration with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging my ability to articulate complex technical ideas through effective technical writing.
